entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
